perfil_ambiental.descripcion_1: The <1>environmental profile</1> is an initiative that rewards commitment to caring for the environment, allowing you to earn points that you can then redeem for exclusive benefits. It is aimed at tourists and the local community, with the goal of promoting sustainability, responsible tourism, and conservation.
perfil_ambiental.descripcion_2: To participate, you just need to register your sustainable action on the platform and follow the indicated steps. Join the change and enjoy its benefits!
perfil_ambiental.nivel_maximo: You've already reached the highest level!
perfil_ambiental.sin_nivel: You don't have a level assigned yet. Submit a sustainable action to begin your environmental journey!
perfil_ambiental.instrucciones: To access the program's benefits, follow these steps:
perfil_ambiental.paso_1: Select the sustainable action you performed.
perfil_ambiental.paso_2: Attach an image that demonstrates your participation.
perfil_ambiental.paso_3: If you'd like, you can add more details in the comment section.
perfil_ambiental.paso_4: (Optional) Indicate on the map where you performed the action.
perfil_ambiental.paso_final: Once all steps are completed, click on "Submit evidence".
perfil_ambiental.modal_mensaje: Evidence successfully submitted. Your commitment counts. You will soon see your points reflected in your environmental profile.
perfil_ambiental.error_envio_evidencia: There was an error submitting the evidence.
